title: Captain Fortune Skin?
body: Hey Riot when are you gonna make the Captain Fortune Skin{{champion:21}} available? its obviously seen in the store but yet it says It is unavailable, Im just curious when it is gonna out (again available I mean)

replies.body:
Hiya! 

She'll be available later this patch. Generally, not all skins are available at the beginning of a patch, but unlock throughout.

Each set of skins came out during the Acts of the event. 

Graves and TF came out during Act 1

Aatrox, Garen, and Quinn came out during Act 2 

So MF should be out during Act 3.
